original_title: How To Make Friends In A Hospital
overview: How to Make Friends in a Hospital follows a young drummer and his curious coping mechanism upon the fallout of his cancer diagnosis. As well as the death of his daughter. With the help of his MP3 player, he learns how to forge a community with his fellow patients - a pair of twins, a ramshackle post-grad, and an absentee mother - even as time progresses.
title: How To Make Friends In A Hospital
